item.title: Horace add a quote by Sousuke Aizen
item.description: "Don't use such strong words. It'll only make you look weak." -- Sousuke Aizen

item.title: Horace add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "Do you know why the big brother is born first? It’s to protect the little brothers and sisters that come after him. A brother telling his sister, "I’ll kill you"... You never, ever say something like that." -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Horace add a quote by Jack London
item.description: "A vast silence reigned over the land. The land itself was a desolation, lifeless, without movement, so lone and cold that the spirit of it was not even that of sadness. There was a hint in it of laughter, but of laughter more terrible than any sadness-a laughter that was mirthless as the smile of the Sphinx, a laughter cold as the frost and partaking of the grimness of infallibility. It was the masterful and incommunicable wisdom of eternity laughing at the futility of life and the effort of life. It was the Wild, the savage, frozen-hearted Northland Wild." -- Jack London

item.title: Horace add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "We should not shed tears That is a surrender of the body to the heart It is only proof That we are beings that do not know What to do with out hearts" -- Tite Kubo
